attributes.review: I opened the app just to be BOMBARDED with notifications and truly idiotic comments and suggestions. Did a toddler make this app? sure seems like it. i get at least 100 notifications PER DAY from this app , EXCUSE ME? 100?! i’m not kidding. i would not even recommend this app to my worst enemy. shouldn’t have ever downloaded. ✨settle for Biden 2020✨
attributes.title: So useless and too many notifications

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support my favorite president 💕🙀🌸 and when this HORRIBLE APP downloaded and i go check on my daddy and he saw a orange on my screen and he slapped me 😔🥺😿 and he throw my dog at me 🐕 😸😻😹🥺 then later my dog had a seizure 😑😺💕 then i had to dig a hole in my back yard 🕳 🐉😭😾 and my dad throw me in the hole 😽😍🌸 and im rn scared for my life because all this happen because i downloaded this app 😜🙀😿😭
attributes.title: rip to my dad 🙈

attributes.review: kept getting notifications! one every fifteen minutes to say the least! after I turned notifications off I started getting emails and there was no way to unsubscribe! my inbox is filled with so many emails I cant keep up! so annoying!! not worth it!! deleting right now!!!!
attributes.title: absolutely awful

I really think y’all should donate to Bernie’s campaign instead 😍🧚‍♀️💞 But since he isn’t really running anymore, Biden should do. Anyone but Trump rlly 😒

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and all of a sudden my power shut off. i was super confused but then i heard a loud crunching noise from the hallway and realized that the big cheeto was coming towards my room (this next part will surprise you). the ginormous hairy cheeto was dragging my memaw into my bedroom by her pinky toe and he ended up eating her in front of me... do NOT recommend if you want to still have a memaw...
attributes.title: ew
